bio: TKN is an onchain token tracker, with a companion headless UI (Example: Send Eth to dai.swp.eth to receive dai back in the same transaction)
contributionDescription:
TKN has shipped a decentralized, onchain token tracker protocol, that anyone can suggest changes to, which serves as decentralized public infrastructure for OP tokens. 

Maintaining an online token registry allows TKN to publish a "headless" interface at swp.eth. Example: users can send eth to usdc.swp.eth and $USDC will be automatically returned.

We launched the TKN DAO on Optimism, with a unique token claim structure that doesn't require gas or trust from the user: claim.tkn.xyz/

Products shipped:
(See our full product list in glorious illustrated color: https://giveth.io/project/token-name-service)
- Token subgraph
- Developer API: docs.tkn.xyz/developers/querying-the-tns-dataset
- TokenList: https://tokenlists.org/token-list?url=list.tkn.eth
- Web app
- iOS app
- Whitepaper
- SWP.eth

contributionLinks.description: Token tracker application and data editor

impactDescription:
TKN has shipped a suite of products, we have begun to focus on growth

Primary impact metrics: 
- Total token datapoints
(uncensorable datapoints persisted onchain)
- Total tokens indexed
(Total number of ticker symbols onchain)
